price: E, se te desmentem, Muhammad, com efeito, antes deles o povo de Noé e o de Ãd e o de Thamud já desmentiram a seus Mensageiros.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wathamūdu
